entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1 except minus 5 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 except minus 5 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023
